body:
You can allow users to add more than one answer to a question. To do this, you make components ‘repeatable’.

1. Navigate to the instance screen of the component that you want to be repeatable
2. Click on ‘Repeatable’
3. On the next screen, select ‘yes’ and click ‘Update Repeatable’


On the component page, you should now see a new menu option for ‘Repeatable properties’. Click on this to see a list of properties you can set:

- Repeatable section heading optional
- Repeatable section first paragraph optional
- Minimum number of repeatable items optional
- Maximum number of repeatable items optional
- Text to add another answer optional
- Add another default
- Text to remove an answer
heading: Making components repeatable
